attributes.action: Courts Must change the Sentence for Cruelty to Foxes and other Wildlife to 6mths
attributes.additional_details:
Wildlife Must be Fully Protected from such acts with the Punishment fitting the Crime, far too many instances like this to Dogs and Cats, let’s try and put things right in Law.

Please sign.
attributes.background: Due to the Sentence given to Two for very Serious cruelty to Fox Cubs which was ONLY suspended jail terms each, the Minimum Sentence must be Six Months in Prison, the little Cubs Suffered a Horrible Death and leaves it open for the same to happen again, these so called Humans have no regard for them
